Articles.Content:
I have LEM Ascent Stage ready with glass windows.

Can somebody explain how to spawn kerbals visible while on outer scene?

http://i.imgur.com/U9bFbzfl.png

If i understand good you need this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24751-0-23-Version-0-05-sfr-Command-Pod-with-internal-parts-and-crew-visible-new-color
Yeah, sorry denny. You need a plugin for that.
Well you cant without a plugin. That's why everyone just blacks out their windows form the outside. You could use a command seat but then there would be no IVA.

well, something strange going on. Internal was ok with external model in IVA, but if i move it, it will not be ok, right?

should i move internal in special way?

Edited January 31, 2014 by DennyTX

Open one of the configs in the mod copy the parts that use the plugin. Im assuming its this bit that does the magic.

MODULE 
{
	name = JSIInternalPersistence
}

By the way, how did you get the door to open from inside the IVA? I could never get anything to animate in the IVA view?

well...

seems like shaitan-mashine is ready

full package has been sent to Frizzank, he will look at and test and will decide about relise.

few notes: IVA has been built for using with RPM. Otherwise commander's looks down mirror, usable hatch, Apollo comp and all instruments, exclude stock, will not work. I have LEM fully equipped with its own instruments, but decided to leave some stock's devices.
Excellent. Now waiting for the Apollo CM.

Just replace navball texture with black-white version

If its possible.

That is starting to look pretty good. Though I can not help but feel the art style is slightly different than that of the FASA pieces.

How modular is everything? Are the lander legs and similar things seperate items?

Edited February 17, 2014 by Camacha
Congratulations on first Beta release Denny! Good luck with all future projects!
